text: Era tugenda kujja mu bifuba byabwe obukukuuzi bwonna, (balibeera mu jjana) nga ekulukutiramu e migga, era baligamba nti amatendo gonna ga Katonda oyo eyatulungamya eri e kkubo erituuka eri kino, tetwali baakulungama singa Katonda teyatulungamya mazima ababaka ba Mukama omulabirizi waffe bye baaleeta mazima meereere, era balikowoolwa nti eyo e jjana mugifunye olw'ebyo bye mwaali mukola
